title: SERP Data Collector
description: Fetch and analyze Search Engine Results Page (SERP) data using Apify Google Search Scraper. Provides comprehensive SERP analysis with AI-powered topic extraction and search intent classification.

keywords.title: Keywords
keywords.description:
Keywords to fetch SERP data for. The system will collect organic search results, paid results, and AI overviews for each keyword.

**Examples:**
• ['digital marketing', 'seo tools', 'content marketing']
• ['web development', 'react framework', 'javascript tutorials']
• ['e-commerce platform', 'online store builder']

batch_size.title: Batch Size
batch_size.description: Number of keywords to process in a single batch. Larger batches may be more efficient but could hit rate limits.

resultsPerPage.title: Results Per Page
resultsPerPage.description: Number of search results to fetch per page for each keyword.

country.title: Country Code
country.description: Country code for SERP data targeting (e.g., 'us' for United States, 'uk' for United Kingdom, 'de' for Germany).

searchLanguage.title: Search Language
searchLanguage.description: Search language for SERP data (e.g., 'en' for English, 'es' for Spanish, 'fr' for French).

languageCode.title: Language Code
languageCode.description: Language code for SERP data (e.g., 'en' for English, 'es' for Spanish).

top_n.title: Top N Results
top_n.description: Number of top organic results to consider for aggregation per keyword. This affects brand/competitor ranking analysis.

brands.title: Brand Names
brands.description: List of brand names to identify and track in SERP data. The system will calculate brand rankings and mentions in organic results and AI overviews.

competitors.title: Competitor Names
competitors.description: List of competitor names to identify and track in SERP data. The system will calculate competitor rankings and mentions in organic results and AI overviews.

topic_max_samples.title: Topic Max Samples
topic_max_samples.description: Maximum number of samples to use for AI-powered topic and intent extraction from SERP data. Higher values provide more comprehensive analysis but increase processing time.
